query.prompt:
This text is written in Ancient Greek. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood, Voice and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Ἐν μέσῳ τῆς ὁδοῦ τῆς ζωῆς ἡμῶν 9 θὰ πῶ γιὰ τἄλλα πράγματα ποὺ εἶδα ἐκεῖ. 28 Ἔπειτα ἀφού ξεκούρασα λίγο τὸ κουρασμένο σῶμα, 67 Ἀπεκρίθη μοι: «Οὐκ ἄνθρωπος, ἄνθρωπος ἤδη ἐγενόμην,
